title: Disenchanting skin shards needs to be worth more

Thanks to the tournament mode (Clash) you get so many skinshards for like, 2000 BE (that's how much a ticket costs to take part in one).

I have to say if they didn't reduce the amount you get from disenchanting skinshards then you would have way too much and it would be too easy to get those (at the moment) expensive skinshards.

Well, you can argue that you have to take part in a tournament (and ergo playing as 5 premades) and win at least one round + paying the already high BE costs (the community says its harder to get but I feel no difference in my BE income). But it works for me and hopefully a lot of the other players too.
